description:
Anise Tatlin is the guardian of the Order of Lorelei`s highest official, the Fon Master. She is a bright and cheerful little girl, but can sometimes show a darker side when provoked, and often hides her emotions when she is suffering. Because of her family`s bad financial situation, she seeks to marry into money, and conspires to become Luke`s wife. As a puppeteer, she can make her stuffed toy, Tokunaga, grow into gigantic proportions and attack enemies.
It is later revealed that she is spying on Ion for Mohs because he had helped her family through a difficult time.
name: Anise Tatlin
